text: Canteen chalega?
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text:
Sir _/\_ 
One of the most talented people i've met at IITK. All the best for future, milte rehna. Cheers
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Y17 ka sabse chaapu with probably the worst sleep schedule :P Anyway really enjoyed working with you and learnt a lot. Milte rehna, hopefully aur papers eksath kr sakte hai.
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: One of the most amicable person who is equally hardworking and intelligent too. Solving theory assignments with you were really fun and thanks for all the help. But apart from acads you have quite a swag personality too and it's a shame we couldnt meet in fourth year. Hopefully abar dekha hobe, keep contact, all the best!
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Bolo zuban kesari
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Amazing person, loved interacting with you everytime. Keep contact, hoping to catch up someday!
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Theory god! Really amazing and intelligent person, thoroughly enjoyed discussions with you about ACA project, courses, assignments, projects etc. and learnt a lot from you. Amazing to find a person with the same interests in research as mine and hope to work together in the near future! Keep contact, cheers.
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Eww (3)
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Wanted to add to the spamming about the first year ART105 incedents. You're probably the best video editor I've seen and it was really fun (trying to) make short films with you. Spam krte rehna, PUBG unban ho to will look forward to more toxic gaming.
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Wing trip when?
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Really wholesome person with pretty contrasting online and offline personalities. Keep suggesting TV series, kafi interests match hote hai (I agree good place was amazing). Contact rakhna and pandemic ke baad meetup krna hi hai.
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: BONK

author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text:
PP,
Most friendly person at iitk who was always ready to meet up. Always enjoyed interacting with you and random trips to Z^2 were especially fun. Hope to meet up in fifth year and spam group trip to baki hai hi. Keep contact and give my regards to Neha Vyas ;*
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: The irony in your life is more fun than the ironic memes you share. Hopefully 5th year me maza ho
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Laal selam comrade
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: Fooling around with you was always fun, but would have been more if RR/CC me AC rehta.
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti

text: A great friend at IITK. Unfortunately humlogo ka interaction kafi late shuru hua only due to theory courses (and thanks for all the help in exams and assignments!). Really intelligent dude and a budding chef, hopefully tera recipes kabhi taste krne milega. Cheers
author: Sayak  Chakrabarti
